title: #683 CANCEL EVERYTHING BECAUSE RACISM! | Michael Knowles Guests | Louder with Crowder
description: We’re culturally appropriating South Korea, discussing the latest protest news, the cancellation of everything cop-related, and examining why the polls so often get things wrong when it comes to Trump. Joined by guest Michael Knowles of the Daily Wire!
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
